step.cmd: If a bat is found out during the day it needs help and to be assessed before release to ensure it is ok.

Without directly handling the bat, place gently into a container such as a shoe box, with air holes (put these in before the bat!) lined with an old t-shirt, towel or other similar clean material. This can be used to help pick up the bat.
Food is not necessary at this stage. If possible offer water on a clean paintbrush or tissue paper dripped on mouth.
